item.title: SMM & Ads - Upwork
item.description:
I'd rather you tell me if you're not great at X, Y, Z but you're an expert in one of the things on my list. I can find someone else for other jobs, but what I don't want is if you say you're good at everything if that's not the case.

GOAL: Find clients ASAP
GOAL: Run ads & retarget, but really push all available free online marketing like SMM & blogs etc.

IN PRIORITY ORDER:
make posts in Canva but ideally in Plasfy & schedule posts in VistaSocial
paste clips of my videos together in FlexClip
manage the main video editor to deliver on time
SEO blog with my AI apps
improve and run my email marketing in Influencer Soft
make and run funnels in Influencer Soft
optimize YT videos on AI app
podcast editing & inviting guests
use AI apps to check stats & competitors in all areas: SMM, ads, SEO, etc, understand how we can improve, set goals
In general, work many AI apps into my business to create overall efficiencies & more productivity


Hourly Range: $5.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 02:48 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Canva, Facebook Ads Manager, Retargeting, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Email Marketing, Sales Funnel Builder, Blog, Podcast
Skills: Canva, Facebook Ads Manager, Retargeting, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Email Marketing, Sales Funnel Builder, Blog, Podcast
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing - Remove 10-15 Seconds from Zoom Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are in need of a skilled video editor to remove approximately 10-15 seconds from a video that was recorded on Zoom. The task involves seamlessly cutting out the unwanted portion and ensuring the video flows smoothly without any noticeable transitions. The final video should look polished and professional. We are looking for someone who is experienced in video editing software and can deliver high-quality results.  

Skills required:
- Proficiency in video editing software
- Attention to detail
- Strong communication skills
- Creativity

This is a small project that should be completed within a few days. If the collaboration goes well, there may be potential for additional video editing work in the future.

Budget: $5

Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production

item.title: Video Editor for Music and Travel Influencer - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to create captivating Reels and Tiktok videos for a music and travel influencer. The primary focus will be on delivering visually stunning videos that align with the influencer's aesthetic preferences. As a video editor, you will be responsible for selecting and combining the best clips, enhancing video quality, adding graphics and effects, and ensuring smooth transitions. Attention to detail and creativity are essential in this role.
    

Skills required:
    - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.)
    - Strong understanding of video composition, lighting, and color grading
    - Ability to create engaging and shareable content
    - Knowledge of current trends and best practices in social media video editing
    - Excellent communication and collaboration skills
    

Looking for a longterm partner. This will be an ongoing job.

Please share with me your most aesthetic video edits.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 02:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Music Video
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Music Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Steam Trailer, Tiktok shorts and Screenshots + GIFs - Upwork
item.description:
Aetherian Chronicles is a 3D MMORPG game similar to Maplestory. We are looking to create 1 steam trailer, 5 tiktok short form videos, 5 screenshots and 5 GIFs as deliverables

See the attached PDF for details on it. How the work will be carried out, is that we will be providing 6 videos of 30 minute playthroughs, all the screenshots, GIFs as well as videos will come from video edited from those 180+ mins worth of content. You can pick and choose which areas of the video to use

When you are applying:
- Give links and show videos/GIFs/screenshots that clearly indicate you know what Steam content is needed for store pages
- Show examples and links to Steam games you worked on, where you provided trailer/assets/GIFs for
- Show tiktok videos you worked with studios/other games

item.title: Youtube/Shorts Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an intermediate video editor for a new ASMR channel for Youtube. While most of the content for editing will be long-form content, you may be asked to also edit shorts for social media sites. We would send the files through a dropbox, for editing through Premiere Pro, and would need the deliverable within 24-36 hours from dropbox. We would like this to be a long-term contract, although low hours per week as we would need anywhere from 1-3 videos edited a week (this can turn into multiple other projects for editing as well as we own multiple channels). Experience with ASMR is ideal and experience with creating Youtube Titles and Descriptions that are SEO/keyword optimized is also very ideal. We are looking for a mix of experience and value. You would need to fit our quality and understand Premier Pro editing, color grading, exporting, etc.

Please include in your proposal a video you've edited for Youtube with the upload or link to a portfolio.


Hourly Range: $5.00-$8.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 02:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Content Creator for Restaurant Reels - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented and creative Video Content Creator to produce engaging and visually appealing reels for our restaurant. You will work with provided assets and create content based on our ideas and references.

Responsibilities:

• Create batches of high-quality reels showcasing our restaurant, menu items, and customer experiences.
• Utilize our branding, assets, and guidelines to ensure consistency.
• Collaborate with our team to brainstorm and execute content ideas.
• Edit and finalize videos for posting on social media platforms.

Requirements:

• Proven experience in video creation and editing, particularly for social media.
• Proficiency in video editing software and tools.
• Strong understanding of current social media trends and best practices.
• Ability to work with our branding and create content that aligns with our vision.
• Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

To Apply:

• Submit samples of your previous work.
• Provide one sample reel using our branding. (Branding assets will be shared upon request.)

Compensation:

• Competitive rates based on experience and quality of work.

We look forward to seeing your creativity and how you can help us elevate our social media presence!

Looking for content: https://www.instagram.com/middaysquares?igsh=MTZhM3RrcGp0OXB5ZQ==

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 28, 2024 02:29 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Company Promo Video Designer - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and creative Animated Promo Video Designer to join our team on a freelance basis. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of transforming dull, explanatory videos into engaging and exciting visual experiences. Your role will involve creating high-quality animated videos that explain complex business automations and showcase demo websites in an appealing way. Additionally, you will design these videos as templates, allowing us to easily customize them for different clients.

Here are the type of business processes we need videos made of:
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C2OCjSXthIU/
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8I41S3xMEG/

Here are the kind of website walkthroughs:
https://www.loom.com/share/5775e5aaea454238b3fb48e905e477aa?sid=3913b5e9-86b3-438d-8614-5645dd801675

Responsibilities:
Video Creation: Transform boring explanatory videos into engaging animated promo videos that capture and maintain the audience's attention.
Content Enhancement: Use animations, graphics, and creative storytelling techniques to explain business automations effectively.
Demo Showcases: Integrate screen recordings of demo websites into the videos, highlighting the new automations and features in an exciting manner.
Template Design: Develop video templates that can be easily customized with different titles, screen recordings, and logos for each client.
Collaboration: Work closely with our team to understand the specific requirements for each project and ensure the final product aligns with our vision.
Quality Assurance: Ensure all videos meet high-quality standards and are delivered on time.

Requirements:
Proven experience in creating animated promo videos, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.
Proficiency in animation and video editing software (e.g., Adobe After Effects, Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
Strong storytelling skills and the ability to simplify complex information through engaging animations.
Experience in creating customizable video templates.
Excellent attention to detail and a creative mindset.
Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with a team.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

What We Offer:

Competitive freelance rates based on experience and the scope of each project.
Flexible working hours and the ability to work remotely.
Opportunity to work with a dynamic team and contribute to the growth of emerging businesses.
Potential for long-term collaboration on various projects.

Application Process:

Please submit your resume along with a portfolio of your recent work. Highlight any previous experience particularly relevant to animated promo videos and customizable templates.

We look forward to seeing your creative approach and discussing how you can contribute to making our explanatory videos more engaging and exciting for our clients!



Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 02:13 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Video Intro & Outro, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Photoshop, Motion Graphics, Adobe Illustrator, Video Editing
Skills: Video Commercial, Video Intro & Outro, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Photoshop, Motion Graphics, Adobe Illustrator, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

Template Design: Develop video templates that can be easily customized with different titles, screen recordings, and logos for each client.
Collaboration: Work closely with our team to understand the specific requirements for each project and ensure the final product aligns with our vision.
Quality Assurance: Ensure all videos meet high-quality standards and are delivered on time.

Requirements:
Proven experience in creating animated promo videos, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.
Proficiency in animation and video editing software (e.g., Adobe After Effects, Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
Strong storytelling skills and the ability to simplify complex information through engaging animations.
Experience in creating customizable video templates.
Excellent attention to detail and a creative mindset.
Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with a team.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

What We Offer:

Competitive freelance rates based on experience and the scope of each project.
Flexible working hours and the ability to work remotely.
Opportunity to work with a dynamic team and contribute to the growth of emerging businesses.
Potential for long-term collaboration on various projects.

Application Process:

Please submit your resume along with a portfolio of your recent work. Highlight any previous experience particularly relevant to animated promo videos and customizable templates.

We look forward to seeing your creative approach and discussing how you can contribute to making our explanatory videos more engaging and exciting for our clients!



Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 02:13 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Video Intro & Outro, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Photoshop, Motion Graphics, Adobe Illustrator, Video Editing

item.title: Social Media Content Creator with AI Experience - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Social Media Content Creator who can help us generate engaging and content for our social media platforms, such as motion graphics, video editing etc... .
This includes creating reels, stories, and feeds that captivate our audience and align with our brand identity. The ideal candidate should have experience using AI tools and software to enhance the quality and creativity of the content, also we are planning to make use of AI avatars as well. Responsibilities will include content creation based on the provided ideas, collaborating with the marketing team, and staying updated on current social media trends. If you have a passion for social media and can leverage AI technology to create compelling content, we'd love to hear from you.

- Motion graphics
- Video editing
- 2D animation
- AI tools and software experience
- Graphic design

item.title: Video editor / Experienced editing needed - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description: Social Media Video Content Creator

Position: Social Media Video Content Creator

Evaluation Contract: $5 for initial evaluation

Pay Rate: $15-$20 per TikTok video

Company Overview:
We are a dynamic and growing dropshipping business seeking a creative and skilled Social Media Video Content Creator to join our team. Our goal is to create engaging TikTok and Facebook ads videos that captivate our audience and drive sales.

Looking for an editor able to edit the projected light message onto another surface (View Clip1 to understand)

As you can see there is an arm, and a projected light message appears on the arms. I am looking for someone to be able if i record my arm with a different background (inside or outside at the beach, at the pool, in the car)  can transplant the light message into the clip with my arm

We are looking for it to be realistic and as if it was real and not knowing it has editing, vfx effect, etc..
You will understand better by looking at the clips provided. The "Original" clip is the video with the actual product where the ring actually reflects a light message with the sunlight.

The other clip name "My arm/background" is me recreating the clip with my arm and a different background but without the correct ring so there is no light message projected on my arm. We need you to transplant or make with editing or vfx the light message as if it was real and like the original clip


Budget: $100
Posted On: June 28, 2024 02:03 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Video Commercial
Country: Canada
click to apply
